hero.description: Transform your ideas into professional, app-ready logos with the power of AI. No design skills needed. Just describe, generate, and download.

features.description: Powerful features designed for developers and entrepreneurs who want professional results without the hassle.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Generation
aiPowered.description: Advanced AI models create unique, professional logos from simple text descriptions.

multipleModels.title: Multiple AI Models
multipleModels.description: Choose from different AI models optimized for various styles - minimalist, detailed, or artistic.

instantDownloads.title: Instant Downloads
instantDownloads.description: Get your logos instantly in high-resolution PNG format, ready for app stores.

colorIntelligence.title: Color Intelligence
colorIntelligence.description: Specify your brand colors and watch AI incorporate them seamlessly into your design.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Generate professional logos in under 60 seconds. Iterate quickly until perfect.

commercialReady.title: Commercial Ready
commercialReady.description: All generated logos are unique and ready for commercial use in your applications.

showcase.description: High-quality logos ready for your production environment.

howItWorks.description: No complicated tools, no design skills needed. Just describe, generate, and download.

step1.title: Describe Your Vision
step1.description: Enter your app name and describe what you want. Be as simple or detailed as you like.

step2.title: AI Creates Magic
step2.description: Our advanced AI models analyze your input and generate multiple unique logo options.

step3.title: Download & Use
step3.description: Pick your favorite, download in high resolution, and use it immediately.

cta.description: Join thousands of developers and entrepreneurs who have already created stunning logos with AI.

footer.tagline: Create stunning, professional logos with the power of AI. No design skills required.
